body_content.explanation: to say or do something that shows a complete change of opinion or behaviour:
examples: The government official made an about-turn and agreed to the meeting.
This isn't the first time that he has made an about turn.

body_content.explanation: to suddenly turn and face in the opposite direction:
examples: I hadn't gone far when I remembered I hadn't locked the door, so I made a quick about-turn and went back.
They saw her make a sudden about-turn.
